message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $8,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,000 to meet you halfway. This is a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product. Let's make this deal!
I appreciate the effort to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,250. I'm really interested in the product, and I think we can find a mutually beneficial price.
